Uses of Class
simphony.util.messages.MessageCenter

  • Packages that use MessageCenter 
    Package Description
    simphony.util.messages  

    • Uses of MessageCenter in simphony.util.messages

      Methods in simphony.util.messages that return MessageCenter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MessageCenter MessageCenter.getMessageCenter(java.lang.Class clazz)
      Creates a MessageCenter for the specified class.
      static MessageCenter MessageCenter.getMessageCenter(java.lang.Class clazz, java.util.Map properties)
      Currently this method is no different then getMessageCenter(Class) but it is here in case at some point MessageCenter's can be setup with a variety of properties.
      static MessageCenter MessageCenter.getMessageCenter(java.lang.String name)
